scripts.revo-phoenepe-deploy: gcloud run deploy revo-phoenepe-sit --image gcr.io/revo-dev-and-test/revo-phoenepe-sit:latest --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --port 8080 --service-account revo-dev-fileupload@revo-dev-and-test.iam.gserviceaccount.com --execution-environment gen2
